doc: "Add New Content Type" modal dialog displayed bottom aligned
| Node Version  | NPM Version |     Strapi Version    | Database |           OS                     | Resolution | Browser |
The "Add New Content Type" modal dialog is displayed at the bottom of the window and causes the content pane to expand, displaying the scroll bar.
With a full screen browser, open the "Add New Content Type" modal dialog.  Notice that the dialog is bottom aligned and the page is now scrollable.
The "Add New Content Type" modal dialog should be vertically and horizontally centered on the page.
